alert.note: Alert for Ector; Midland (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 01 at 7:11PM CDT until July 01 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Midland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Ector County in western Texas... Southwestern Midland County in western Texas... * Until 800 PM CDT. * At 711 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Odessa, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...The Odessa Airport reported a wind gust of 63 mph at 658 PM CDT. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Odessa, Midland International Air and Space Port, Warfield and Odessa Schlemeyer Field. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 116 and 130. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
